item.title: Lecture 07 - Geodatabases
item.description: Meta Key Topics ArcCatalog Data wrangling Geodatabases lubridate R readr sf stringr Writing Data Resources Open on Functions Lab-06 LP-07 Lecture Slides Re-writing Shapefiles in R Some of you may have been confronted with an error in the lecture prep when you went to knitr your notebook after testing all of its code:
